sentence.Network_en: They have a great contempt for conventionality.
Nowadays novelists aim at novelty either in subject or in style, instead of following the beaten path of conventionality.
sentence.Network_cn: 近来,小说家在题材上或文体上追求新奇而不走传统老路.

sentence.Network_en: The other side of coin of arbitrariness, namely conventionality.
sentence.Network_cn: 任意性的相反面, 即约定性.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 合包囊_互动百科 ... conventionalist 墨守成规者 conventionality 常规 conventionality 惯例.
conventional-type lubricant 习用润滑油conventionality 照例converge 集中于
conventionalism 因循主义conventionality 因循性converge 集中
...词的意义和形式之间没有必然的联系,它们之间的关系是约定俗成(conventionality)的.但是,并不是所有的词都像 tree 那样毫无理据.

list.abs: The nymph as do not contain any conventionally picturesque details ., 画中的睡莲没有任何传统的独特细节.
these attributes naturally also apply to the ML 450 HYBRID , which in these respects offers performance a par with the conventionally powered variants .这些属性，自然也适用于的ML450混合动力，它在这些方面的性能等同于与常规动力的变种。
control switches are conventionally mounted on the steering colum ., 巡游控制开关按常规安装在转向轩上.
one mission being developed for the 2nd Artillery Corps is that of anti-carrier strike using precision-guided conventionally armed ballistic missiles .二炮部队的一个新任务就是使用精确制导的常规弹头弹道导弹执行反航母打击任务。

means.word_mean: 1. conformity with conventional thought and behavior
2. unoriginality as a result of being too conventional
3. orthodoxy as a consequence of being conventional

auth_sentence.content: The noise distracts, but cannot mask, the deep conventionality of the exhibit.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The noise distracts, but cannot mask, the deep conventionality of the exhibit.

auth_sentence.content: In the marketplace of arena rock, that measure of conventionality was a strength, not a limitation.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the marketplace of arena rock, that measure of conventionality was a strength, not a limitation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the marketplace of arena rock, that measure of conventionality was a strength, not a limitation.

auth_sentence.content: The more I see of conventionality, it seems, the more I am odd.
auth_sentence.res_content: The more I see of conventionality, it seems, the more I am odd.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The more I see of conventionality, it seems, the more I am odd.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重大的,重要的,多变故的

event[n.事件,事情]+ual……的→出事之后[最终]的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
stems_affixes.word_buile: invent[v.发明,创造;捏造,虚构]+ive……的→adj.善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
prevent[v.[from]预防,防止,阻止,制止,妨碍]+ive……的→adj.预防性的
eventual[adj.最后的,结局的,最终的]+ly表副词→adv.最后, 终于
eventual最终的+ity表名词→最终可能发生的
inter之间+vent走+ion表名词→走在二者之间→干涉
invent发明,创造+ion表名词→n.发明, 创造
convention集会;习俗+ality表名词→n.陈规陋习,因袭传统
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
ventilate[v.使通风;给…装通风设备]+ion表名词→n.通风
